Hi all

I'm Valarie Tan from Radio Singapore International RSI

Doing a special radio feature on samurai culture.
Interested to speak to a real samurai descendant. Want to know some 
personal family stories. 

Please help as how or who I should contact to get in touch with one. 

Thanks!

reg,Val
